website_summaries.verdict: A good low-cost way to dress up a room for parties.
pros: Good fit and easy to put on
cons: Needs to be ironed before use and also after washing, which — due to the shape — is finicky and time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Half of the 8 we have bought have not lasted 2 months. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Edward Perrault

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not so durable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these over and over for years now. I wish they were more durable. They only stay in good shape for about 6 months at my kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: SC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little snugger.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a sloppy fit. Could have been more snug, but that may be because of my style of chair. Would be nice if in the top pleat there could have been a velcro strip to make the cover tighter. They are soft, easy to clean and easy to install. great look for my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my chairs - arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The first slipcover out of the package had a torn seam. I thought maybe I would just send that one back. Tried it on - it wasn't wide enough to fit the chair. I measured 3 times before ordering - the measurements listed are NOT what they are. Very disappointed - sent all 4 packages back.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended but thin
customer_reviews.text: These were a little small until the wrinkles were ironed out. Now they fit perfect. The fabric is a bit thin.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than I expected. They look nice covering up some chairs my wife dug out of the trash. You really can’t tell what is under them. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: bobmac

customer_reviews.title: #BoyMom - thick material protects from spills
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for! We have a set with silk damask covered chairs, that we wanted to use more, but have little boys. I bought these covers and and were able to reclaim our favorite dining set to use daily without worries of of spills and stains. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but everyone I bought has tore on me. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love surefit products and these slipcovers were no exception just in time for the holidays I just wish Amazon had a larger color and design selection.
customer_reviews.author: Sand stew

customer_reviews.title: Medium linen feel.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable, but not what I ordered so I gave away.
customer_reviews.author: LeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointment. While the fit is good for two high backed cane chairs I wanted to cover, the color is completely off and misrepresented on this site. I wanted a white, cream colored or natural linen color for these chairs to complement furniture already in the room. Looking at this photo that's what I thought I was purchasing. NOT SO!! The color turned out to be a dark khaki--almost olive---nothing I'd ever associate with a color deemed "linen"
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Decent fit, no stretch and wrinkle easily.
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be a heavier weight, but they still look lovely in my dining room. Color is spot on. Need to be steamed regularly if you care about wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Redding

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair cover. The color is exactly as pictured, a soft khaki/mocha color. It is a little long, but I think it just adds to the beauty. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChicaD

customer_reviews.title: Sure Fit
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit and quality of product. Terrific way of sprucing up your dining room chairs. Product delivery time was excellent exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Fairly easy to put on. Serves its purpose as I only use when guests come over with their house-trained pets.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a separate rating for sellers, because Surefit just impressed the heck out of me!
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I wanted to cover my stained parsons dining chairs. The color was just about what I expected....it's like sage. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: BDJ

customer_reviews.title: or it won't look nearly as good as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Ok--after washing be prepared to do some serious ironing, or it won't look nearly as good as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Melihandix

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased six of these chair covers and they're the perfect neutral tan. i did have a friend that ordered these but her parsons chairs were smaller than mine and they fit her chairs very loose, but mine are a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: lcwatkins310

customer_reviews.title: LINEN WRINKLES AND BAGS
customer_reviews.text: BAGGY AND DID NOT FIT AT ALL. SO DISAPPOINTED. I SPENT A LOT OF MONEY ON THESE AND THEY LOOK TERRIBLE AFTER I IRONED THEM FOR 2 HOURS
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit over skirted Parsons chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are a light beige color. I had white Parsons chairs that were heavily stained. I needed something light to go with my dining room set so i chose these. My chairs already had a skirt on them. I wanted attractive, full coverage of EVERYTHING on my chairs and these covers were perfect. I got them in, ironed them and slipped them on over my chairs and tied them in the back. Perfect fit and they are lovely. Great purchase and saved me from having to buy new chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Dino Velvett

customer_reviews.title: Like but color VERY dark and I saw on any person's review
customer_reviews.text: They are very long also but I am making do. They are darker almost a taupe color. I was aware of color but not at all the color on the package. Fast service!
customer_reviews.author: Baywatcher

customer_reviews.title: Great chair cover
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Color is beautiful. Took it to my local monogrammed and had my initials monogrammed on the back. For the cost of the chair cover, and monogram fee I have an inexpensive chair that looks like it cost hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Daniels

customer_reviews.title: just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Fits the chairs perfectly and is exactly as pictured.I wish they made one in a lighter linen color but this one is that natural color that is so popular and the price is incredible.I am going to add buttons at the corners or maybe a monogram to personalize them.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: They fit my chairs great covered where my cat had made a mess with ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit my chairs great covered where my cat had made a mess with thier claws. looked great for christmas.thankl you
customer_reviews.author: Frank Galiardi

customer_reviews.title: Liked the quality, but didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these covers for my dining room chairs. I was concerned that they may not fit because my chairs are a bit oversized. The back was a little tight and the cover did not fit well over my cushions. If you have average size chairs there would have been no problem. I did like the material. It felt as though it would have been fine for my purpose. I had hoped the color would be a little lighter. It was more toward a sage green. I returned the covers because of the fit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great slip cover!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our cloth dining chairs I had bought a few years ago from a mid level furniture chain (pier 1) my two year old was destroying the chairs with spilling food, so I ordered these slip covers. I wasnt sure these would work for us since reviews on other sites aren't great but they fit perfectly and look beautiful very high end!! I have only thrown them in the dryer to get the wrinkles out so far but the fabric seams as thought it will wash well!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sailer

customer_reviews.title: Dining Chair Covers
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair covers. The fit easily over my chairs and they look great! I'm so glad I chose these!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Great new look
customer_reviews.text: Without having to replace chair, our dining room got a new fresh look. The covers fit well and wash easily if anything spills. They will wrinkle if washed, so be careful drying them.
customer_reviews.author: catintx

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: The color selection on the site says "white" but shows more of a taupe. Should have trusted the pic. Thought we ordered white got taupe
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice! Just as you see. Love the quality. I like a lot!
customer_reviews.author: EyeStrong

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these as they are a poor fit. The greatest disappointment is that sure-fit will not take them back as they are a "final sale". This was not obvious to me when I purchased them!!! They offered me a 20% discount on another purchase which likely is another opportunity for a poor fit!
customer_reviews.author: joanna foster

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit a 38 inch no arm chair, says it fits most armless chairs up to 42 inches. They were nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Surefit Home Décor Duck Solid Long Full Length Dining Room Chair One Piece Slipcover, Relaxed Fit, 100% Cotton, Machine Washable, Linen Color
product_meta.description: Sure Fit Home Décor Cotton Duck Solid Long Full Length Dining Room Chair One Piece Slipcover, Relaxed Fit, 100% Cotton, Machine Washable. We've just made it easier to dress up your dining room, mix & match in your living room- or even transform your kitchen with these beautiful Long Dining Chair Covers. Our ultra-versatile Cotton Duck collection creates a clean foundation that compliments any decorating style. Loop the ties for a casual look or make a bow to achieve a dressier style. This slipcover fits most dining chairs with average seat width of 18" and back height up to 42". Our relaxed one-piece construction includes adjustable ties. Machine wash separately in cold water on gentle cycle and tumble dry low. Do not use bleach. Warm iron as needed.
feature_bullets: SLIPCOVER: We've just made it easier to dress up your dining room, mix & match in your living room- or even transform your kitchen with these beautiful Long Dining Chair Covers. Our ultra-versatile Cotton Duck collection creates a clean foundation that compliments any decorating style. Loop the ties for a casual look or make a bow to achieve a dressier style.
SIZE: Fits most dining chairs with average seat width of 18" and back height up to 42"
RELAXED FIT: Relaxed one-piece construction with adjustable ties
EASY MAINTENANCE: Machine wash separately in cold water on gentle cycle and tumble dry low. Do not use bleach. Warm iron as needed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
